title: sWeEPinG gUn rEfOrM, Fortune Favors The Broke! 06.21.22
itunes:title: sWeEPinG gUn rEfOrM, Fortune Favors The Broke! 06.21.22
description:
In episode 1272, Jack and Miles are joined by writer, director, and co-host of 1Upsmanship, Adam Ganser, to discuss… We might get gun laws…but they are arguing over what an abusive partner is, The Biden Shouldn't Run Chorus Getting Louder, No, Disney Didn’t “Castrate” Buzz Lightyear, Matt Damon is the Official Face of Crypto F-ckery and more!

  1. We might get gun laws…but they are arguing over what an abusive partner is
  2. The Biden Shouldn't Run Chorus Getting Louder
  3. No, Disney Didn’t “Castrate” Buzz Lightyear
  4. Buzz Lightyear recast with Chris Evans over Tim Allen, fans wonder if politics 'had something to do with it'
  5. Did Disney Deny Tim Allen ‘Lightyear’ Role Due to His Political Beliefs?
  6. Matt Damon is the Official Face of Crypto F-ckery
  7. $1,000 worth BTC bought after Matt Damon’s crypto ad is now worth only $375
  8. Here’s how much money you would’ve lost if you bought crypto during Matt Damon’s ‘Fortune Favors the Brave’ commercial
  9. If You'd Listened to Matt Damon on Crypto, You'd Have Lost This Much Money

LISTEN: You Can Be A Star by Luther Davis Group

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
